<a id="Path3D"></a>

# Path3D

**Inherits:** [Node3D](Node3D.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Contains a [Curve3D](Curve3D.md) path for [PathFollow3D](PathFollow3D.md) nodes to follow.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Can have [PathFollow3D](PathFollow3D.md) child nodes moving along the [Curve3D](Curve3D.md). See [PathFollow3D](PathFollow3D.md) for more information on the usage.

Note that the path is considered as relative to the moved nodes (children of [PathFollow3D](PathFollow3D.md)). As such, the curve should usually start with a zero vector ``(0, 0, 0)``.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="Path3D_property_curve"></a>

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Path3D_property_debug_custom_color"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Color](Color.md) **debug_custom_color** = `Color(0, 0, 0, 1)` [ðŸ”—](#Path3D_property_debug_custom_color)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_debug_custom_color**\ (\ value\: [Color](Color.md)\ )
- [Color](Color.md) **get_debug_custom_color**\ (\ )

The custom color to use to draw the shape in the editor.

If set to ``Color(0.0, 0.0, 0.0)`` (by default), the color set in EditorSettings is used.
